If the game doesn’t start, or if you don’t get audio, lower the sample rate of your sound-card to 48 kHz
Control Panel > Sound > select your default playback device > click Properties > Advanced Tab > change the sample rate to 48000 Hz

First of all this is no different than any other .bin or ISO game FFS.

 Use universal extractor or 7zip to extract(preferably universal extractor for no errors).
Mount the .bin file or burn to disc.
 Run setup.exe to install the game.
Now,open the .bin file and look for the folder named TinyiSO.
Open that folder and copy the file inside.
 Paste it in the installed folder in your program files overwriting the existing .exe 
DONE
